Unnamed Package

  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    BedroomScene
    Represents the UI and logic for the bedroom scene in EvoPets.
    ButtonManager
    A helper class that scales and resizes buttons.
    CreditsScene
    This class represents the credits scene in the main menu and all its UI components.
    Gacha
    A gacha is a system that randomly gives items to the player.
    GameScene
    The parent class for all scenes in the game.
    GameState
    A custom data structure storing information that should be kept between save files.
    GameTimer
    Represents timers that will continuously run every few seconds.
    ImageManager
    Utility class used to scale and resize images.
    InfoScene
    Represents a scene that stores a list of information for the player to read.
    Inventory
    An inventory is a list of items that the player has.
    InventoryScene
    Represents the scene that stores the inventory, allowing the player to use items.
    Item
    Represents an item in the inventory.
    Keyboard
    Keyboard class to handle keyboard navigation and button firing in JavaFX applications.
    KitchenScene
    Represents the kitchen scene.
    LoadAndNewGameScene
    Represents the scene that contains the new and load game button.
    LoadGameScene
    Represents the screen where you can choose a past save file to load your game into.
    Main
    Main class for the EvoPets game.
    MainMenuScene
    Represents the main menu scene.
    ParentControlPasswordScene
    This class represents the password entry scene for parental controls.
    ParentControls
    The Parent class provides parental control features such as time restrictions, playtime limits, and pet revival.
    ParentControlsScene
    Represents the parental controls screen where parents can: - Set allowed play time ranges - View playtime statistics - Revive the virtual pet
    Pet
    The main class that stores the attributes of a single pet.
    PetInfoScene
    Represents the info screen on the new game screen that the player can read to learn about the stat differences on the pets.
    PetNameScene
    Represents the screen where the player can name their new pet.
    PetOverlay
    Represents the class that contains the pet UI, including the pet's states.
    PetSelectionScene
    Represents the class where the player chooses the pet type.
    PlaygroundScene
    Represents the playground screen.
    SaveLoadManager
    The SaveLoadManager class handles saving and loading the game state to and from a file using Java serialization.
    ScreenManager
    Represents the class that holds information on all the screens.
    ScreenOverlay
    Represents the UI elements of the gameplay screens besides the pet.
    SettingsScene
    Represents the setting screen.
    SpriteManager
    Represents the class that builds sprites from spritesheet paths.
    Test
     
    TextManager
    A utility class to scale and resize text elements.
    TimeInformation
    A custom class that stores time information for parental controls, to be kept between launches.
    Triple
    Represents a custom data structure to be used in the screen manager class.
    TutorialScene
    Represents the screen where text describing how to play the game is stored and displayed.
    UIUpdate
    Represents a utility class that checks for stat updates for the pet and stat bars, and calls the necessary sprite managers.
    VetScene
    Represents the screen where the pet can be healed, increasing health.
